section.name: DPML Community
section.p: The Digital Product Meta Library is a global community project contributing to the development of advanced Java-based component management solutions. The initial community was formed from a core group of Apache developers focussed on the next generation of component management solutions (a.k.a beyond Avalon). The community established itself with general principals of "low barrier to entry", the "flock of bird" principal concerning evolution, and a high priority on commerical friendliness. Development during the first half of 2005 witnessed a shift towards greater product-driven focus with the core community working towards our first release and the development of operational and administrative processes aimed at community growth and development.

One of our aims is the creation of a non-profit organization, which we anticipate to get incorporated in Q1-2006. This will allow us to engage in more formal activities, establish better infrastructure, marketing materials and much more.
